citations.narrative:
There are sharp points and sharp and jagged edges in 4 enclosures affecting 7 dogs. The sharp points are created from
twisted wires protruding into and at the dog level. The sharp edges are from metal flashing used to cover wooden posts
that the dogs have chewed and pulled upon. These sharp points and edges could cause injury to the dogs. The licensee
must remove/repair these surfaces to protect the dogs from injury. The licensee must ensure that all enclosures are free
of jagged edges or sharp points that might injure the animals at all times.
To be corrected by: 17 Sep 24

There is an accumulation of hair, dirt, old dog food and other debris under 2 outdoor shelters and along the edges of the
enclosures, affecting 4 dogs. This accumulation can attract pests and rodents. The licensee must clean and sanitize these
enclosures and ensure that all enclosures are cleaned an sanitized as often as necessary to satisfy generally accepted
standards and practices.
To be corrected by: 17 Sep 24
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

3.1(c)(1)(ii) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There are sharp points and sharp and jagged edges in 4 enclosures affecting 7 dogs. The sharp points are created from

that the dogs have chewed and pulled upon. These sharp points and edges could cause injury to the dogs. The licensee

of jagged edges or sharp points that might injure the animals at all times.

3.1(c)(3) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is an accumulation of hair, dirt, old dog food and other debris under 2 outdoor shelters and along the edges of the 
enclosures, affecting 4 dogs. This accumulation can attract pests and rodents. The licensee must clean and sanitize these

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
